Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 about the documentation and revitalization of endangered languages through natural language processing (NLP) knowledge, particularly in the context of noisy data

- This article discusses the importance of NLP in the documentation and revitalization of endangered languages, particularly in the context of noisy data
NLP and Endangered Languages: A Review of the Literature
- This review article provides an overview of the use of NLP in the documentation and revitalization of endangered languages
